subject: Football
Domestic Violence
Advertising and Marketing
lead_paragraph: Gov. Mark Dayton of Minnesota called Adrian Peterson, the Vikings’ running back, “a public embarrassment,” and Anheuser-Busch said it was disappointed by recent episodes in the league.
snippet: Gov. Mark Dayton of Minnesota called Adrian Peterson, the Vikings’ running back, “a public embarrassment,” and Anheuser-Busch said it was disappointed by recent episodes in the league.
